description: Detects suspicious scheduled task creations from a parent stored in a temporary folder Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Software installers that run from temporary folders and also install scheduled tasks
name: Suspicious Add Scheduled Task Parent
query: ((process.executable:*schtasks.exe AND process.command_line:*\/Create\ * AND process.parent.executable:(*\\AppData\\Local\\* OR *\\AppData\\Roaming\\* OR *\\Temporary\ Internet* OR *\\Users\\Public\\*)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:(*update_task.xml* OR *unattended.ini*)))))
